div.pre: 1913 Gizzeria, 10 km. W of Nicastro, (444) Bruttium, 1914 Burial: early 4th cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 2 AR, 58 AE. Pot hoard Metapontum: 1 diob. (barley ear/grain) Velia: 3 (Heracles/owl) Croton: 18 (tripod/eagle hd.) 4 (tripod/sepia) Rhegium: 6 (Apollo/lion hd. facing) 1 hemilit. (Herzfelder, pl. 11, K) Messana: 20 (female hd./trident) Blank: 1 Unc.: 2 Disposition: Reggio Putorti, NSc 1914, p. 211 The above totals, which do not altogether correspond with those in NSc, are based on material seen by K at Reggio in 1969
